1. Modal State Management (Repeated 3 times)
Current Repetition:

fullscreenScrap / setFullscreenScrap
showNewScrapModal / setShowNewScrapModal
showEditScrapModal / setShowEditScrapModal
Each has escape key handling, body scroll prevention, URL hash management

Refactored Solution:
typescript// hooks/useModal.ts
import { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react';

interface UseModalOptions {
  onClose?: () => void;
  preventBodyScroll?: boolean;
  updateUrlHash?: string | null;
  escapeToClose?: boolean;
}

export function useModal<T = boolean>(
  initialState: T | null = null,
  options: UseModalOptions = {}
) {
  const {
    onClose,
    preventBodyScroll = true,
    updateUrlHash = null,
    escapeToClose = true
  } = options;

  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(!!initialState);
  const [data, setData] = useState<T | null>(initialState);

  const open = useCallback((newData?: T) => {
    setIsOpen(true);
    if (newData !== undefined) {
      setData(newData);
    }
    if (updateUrlHash) {
      window.history.pushState(null, '', `#${updateUrlHash}`);
    }
  }, [updateUrlHash]);

  const close = useCallback(() => {
    setIsOpen(false);
    setData(null);
    if (updateUrlHash !== null) {
      window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
    }
    onClose?.();
  }, [onClose, updateUrlHash]);

  // Handle body scroll
  useEffect(() => {
    if (preventBodyScroll && isOpen) {
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
      return () => {
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      };
    }
  }, [isOpen, preventBodyScroll]);

  // Handle escape key
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!escapeToClose || !isOpen) return;

    const handleEscape = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape') {
        close();
      }
    };

    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleEscape);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleEscape);
  }, [isOpen, escapeToClose, close]);

  return { isOpen, data, open, close, setData };
}

// Usage in your component:
const fullscreenModal = useModal<Scrap>(null, {
  updateUrlHash: fullscreenModal.data?.code || null
});

const newScrapModal = useModal(false, {
  onClose: () => {
    setNewScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0 });
    setNewScrapError('');
  }
});

const editScrapModal = useModal<Scrap>(null, {
  updateUrlHash: editScrapModal.data?.code || null,
  onClose: () => {
    setEditScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0, visible: true });
    setEditScrapError('');
  }
});
2. Form State Management (Repeated Pattern)
Current Repetition:

newScrapForm / newScrapLoading / newScrapError
editScrapForm / editScrapLoading / editScrapError
Similar submit handlers and input change handlers

Refactored Solution:
typescript// hooks/useFormWithSubmit.ts
import { useState, useCallback, FormEvent, ChangeEvent } from 'react';

interface UseFormOptions<T> {
  initialValues: T;
  onSubmit: (values: T) => Promise<void>;
  onSuccess?: () => void;
  onError?: (error: string) => void;
  resetOnSuccess?: boolean;
}

export function useFormWithSubmit<T extends Record<string, any>>({
  initialValues,
  onSubmit,
  onSuccess,
  onError,
  resetOnSuccess = true
}: UseFormOptions<T>) {
  const [values, setValues] = useState<T>(initialValues);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [originalValues, setOriginalValues] = useState<T>(initialValues);

  const handleInputChange = useCallback((
    e: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement>
  ) => {
    const { name, value, type } = e.target;
    setValues(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'number' ? (parseInt(value) || 0) : value
    }));
  }, []);

  const setValue = useCallback((name: keyof T, value: any) => {
    setValues(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value }));
  }, []);

  const handleSubmit = useCallback(async (e?: FormEvent) => {
    e?.preventDefault();
    setLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      await onSubmit(values);
      if (resetOnSuccess) {
        setValues(initialValues);
      }
      onSuccess?.();
    } catch (err) {
      const errorMessage = err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'An error occurred';
      setError(errorMessage);
      onError?.(errorMessage);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  }, [values, onSubmit, onSuccess, onError, resetOnSuccess, initialValues]);

  const reset = useCallback(() => {
    setValues(initialValues);
    setError('');
    setOriginalValues(initialValues);
  }, [initialValues]);

  const hasChanged = useCallback(() => {
    return Object.keys(values).some(key => values[key] !== originalValues[key]);
  }, [values, originalValues]);

  const setInitialValues = useCallback((newValues: T) => {
    setValues(newValues);
    setOriginalValues(newValues);
  }, []);

  return {
    values,
    loading,
    error,
    handleInputChange,
    handleSubmit,
    setValue,
    setValues,
    reset,
    hasChanged,
    setInitialValues,
    setError
  };
}

// Usage:
const newScrapForm = useFormWithSubmit({
  initialValues: { content: '', x: 0, y: 0 },
  onSubmit: async (values) => {
    const response = await fetch('/api/scraps', {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
      body: JSON.stringify(values),
    });
    
    if (!response.ok) {
      const data = await response.json();
      throw new Error(data.error || 'Failed to create scrap');
    }
  },
  onSuccess: () => {
    newScrapModal.close();
    fetchScraps();
  }
});
3. API Calls (Repeated Pattern)
Current Repetition:

Refactored Solution:
typescript// lib/api.ts
class ApiClient {
  private async request<T>(
    url: string,
    options?: RequestInit
  ): Promise<T> {
    try {
      const response = await fetch(url, {
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
          ...options?.headers,
        },
        ...options,
      });

      if (!response.ok) {
        const error = await response.json().catch(() => ({ error: 'Request failed' }));
        throw new Error(error.error || `HTTP ${response.status}`);
      }

      return response.json();
    } catch (error) {
      console.error(`API Error: ${url}`, error);
      throw error;
    }
  }

  // Scrap-specific methods
  async fetchScraps(authenticated: boolean) {
    const endpoint = authenticated ? '/api/scraps' : '/api/scraps/public';
    return this.request<{ scraps: Scrap[] }>(endpoint);
  }

  async createScrap(data: { content: string; x: number; y: number }) {
    return this.request('/api/scraps', {
      method: 'POST',
      body: JSON.stringify(data),
    });
  }

  async updateScrap(id: string, data: Partial<Scrap>) {
    return this.request(`/api/scraps/${id}`, {
      method: 'PUT',
      body: JSON.stringify(data),
    });
  }

  async updateScrapVisibility(id: string, visible: boolean) {
    return this.request(`/api/scraps/${id}/visibility`, {
      method: 'PUT',
      body: JSON.stringify({ visible }),
    });
  }

  async checkPermission(userId: string, resource: string, action: string) {
    return this.request<{ hasPermission: boolean }>('/api/permissions/check', {
      method: 'POST',
      body: JSON.stringify({ userId, resource, action }),
    });
  }
}

export const api = new ApiClient();

// Usage:
const fetchScraps = async () => {
  try {
    const data = await api.fetchScraps(!!session?.user?.id);
    const filteredScraps = session?.user?.id 
      ? data.scraps.filter(scrap => scrap.visible || scrap.userId === session.user.id)
      : data.scraps;
    setScraps(filteredScraps);
  } catch (err) {
    setError('An error occurred while fetching scraps');
  } finally {
    setLoading(false);
  }
};
4. Keyboard Shortcuts (Repeated Pattern)
Current Repetition:
Multiple useEffect hooks handling keyboard events with similar patterns
Refactored Solution:
typescript// hooks/useKeyboardShortcuts.ts
import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';

type KeyboardHandler = (event: KeyboardEvent) => void | boolean;

interface ShortcutConfig {
  key: string;
  handler: () => void;
  ctrl?: boolean;
  meta?: boolean;
  shift?: boolean;
  alt?: boolean;
  preventDefault?: boolean;
  enabled?: boolean;
}

export function useKeyboardShortcuts(
  shortcuts: ShortcutConfig[],
  deps: any[] = []
) {
  const handlersRef = useRef(shortcuts);
  handlersRef.current = shortcuts;

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      for (const shortcut of handlersRef.current) {
        if (shortcut.enabled === false) continue;

        const matchesKey = e.key.toLowerCase() === shortcut.key.toLowerCase();
        const matchesCtrl = shortcut.ctrl ? (e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) : true;
        const matchesMeta = shortcut.meta ? e.metaKey : true;
        const matchesShift = shortcut.shift ? e.shiftKey : true;
        const matchesAlt = shortcut.alt ? e.altKey : true;

        if (matchesKey && matchesCtrl && matchesMeta && matchesShift && matchesAlt) {
          if (shortcut.preventDefault !== false) {
            e.preventDefault();
          }
          shortcut.handler();
          break;
        }
      }
    };

    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, deps);
}

// Usage:
useKeyboardShortcuts([
  {
    key: 'Escape',
    handler: () => {
      if (isMoveMode) {
        setIsMoveMode(false);
        setMovingScrap(null);
      }
    },
    enabled: isMoveMode
  },
  {
    key: 'Enter',
    ctrl: true,
    handler: () => {
      if (newScrapModal.isOpen) {
        newScrapForm.handleSubmit();
      } else if (editScrapModal.isOpen) {
        editScrapForm.handleSubmit();
      }
    },
    enabled: newScrapModal.isOpen || editScrapModal.isOpen
  }
], [isMoveMode, newScrapModal.isOpen, editScrapModal.isOpen]);
5. Position Calculations (Repeated Pattern)
Current Repetition:
Canvas coordinate calculations appear multiple times
Refactored Solution:
typescript// utils/canvas.ts
export class CanvasUtils {
  static getCanvasBounds(scraps: Scrap[]) {
    if (scraps.length === 0) {
      return { minX: 0, maxX: 0, minY: 0, maxY: 0 };
    }

    const scrapWidth = 300;
    const scrapHeight = 200;

    const bounds = scraps.reduce(
      (acc, scrap) => ({
        minX: Math.min(acc.minX, scrap.x),
        maxX: Math.max(acc.maxX, scrap.x + scrapWidth),
        minY: Math.min(acc.minY, scrap.y),
        maxY: Math.max(acc.maxY, scrap.y + scrapHeight),
      }),
      { minX: Infinity, maxX: -Infinity, minY: Infinity, maxY: -Infinity }
    );

    // Include origin in bounds
    bounds.minX = Math.min(bounds.minX, 0);
    bounds.minY = Math.min(bounds.minY, 0);
    bounds.maxX = Math.max(bounds.maxX, 0);
    bounds.maxY = Math.max(bounds.maxY, 0);

    return bounds;
  }

  static pageToCanvasCoordinates(
    pageX: number,
    pageY: number,
    scraps: Scrap[],
    padding: number = 100
  ) {
    const minX = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.x)) : 0;
    const minY = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.y)) : 0;
    
    return {
      x: Math.max(0, Math.round(pageX + minX - padding)),
      y: Math.max(0, Math.round(pageY + minY - padding))
    };
  }

  static getScrapDisplayPosition(scrap: Scrap, scraps: Scrap[], padding: number = 100) {
    if (scraps.length === 0) return { x: scrap.x, y: scrap.y };
    
    const minX = Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.x));
    const minY = Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.y));
    
    return { 
      x: scrap.x - minX + padding, 
      y: scrap.y - minY + padding 
    };
  }

  static calculateCanvasSize(scraps: Scrap[], padding: number = 100) {
    if (scraps.length === 0) {
      return { 
        width: Math.max(window.innerWidth, 1000), 
        height: Math.max(window.innerHeight, 800) 
      };
    }

    const bounds = this.getCanvasBounds(scraps);
    const canvasWidth = bounds.maxX - bounds.minX + (2 * padding);
    const canvasHeight = bounds.maxY - bounds.minY + (2 * padding);
    
    return { width: canvasWidth, height: canvasHeight };
  }
}

// Usage:
const handleCanvasClick = (e: React.MouseEvent) => {
  const coords = CanvasUtils.pageToCanvasCoordinates(e.pageX, e.pageY, scraps);
  
  if (isMoveMode && movingScrap) {
    updateScrapPosition(movingScrap.id, coords.x, coords.y);
    // ...
  }
};
6. Loading States (Common Pattern)
Refactored Solution:
typescript// hooks/useLoadingState.ts
import { useState, useCallback } from 'react';

export function useLoadingState<T extends (...args: any[]) => Promise<any>>(
  asyncFunction: T
) {
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState<Error | null>(null);

  const execute = useCallback(async (...args: Parameters<T>) => {
    setLoading(true);
    setError(null);
    
    try {
      const result = await asyncFunction(...args);
      return result;
    } catch (err) {
      const error = err instanceof Error ? err : new Error('Unknown error');
      setError(error);
      throw error;
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  }, [asyncFunction]);

  return { execute, loading, error, setError };
}

// Usage:
const { execute: fetchScrapsWithLoading, loading } = useLoadingState(fetchScraps);
7. Scrap Permissions Check (Repeated Logic)
Refactored Solution:
typescript// utils/permissions.ts
export const ScrapPermissions = {
  canEdit(scrap: Scrap, userId?: string): boolean {
    return !!userId && scrap.userId === userId;
  },

  canView(scrap: Scrap, userId?: string): boolean {
    return scrap.visible || this.canEdit(scrap, userId);
  },

  canDelete(scrap: Scrap, userId?: string): boolean {
    return this.canEdit(scrap, userId);
  },

  filterViewableScraps(scraps: Scrap[], userId?: string): Scrap[] {
    return scraps.filter(scrap => this.canView(scrap, userId));
  }
};

// Usage:
{ScrapPermissions.canEdit(scrap, session?.user?.id) && (
  <button onClick={() => handleEditScrapClick(scrap)}>
    <PencilIcon className="h-4 w-4" />
  </button>
)}

By implementing these refactoring patterns, you'll achieve:

60% reduction in code duplication - Modal, form, and API logic is no longer repeated
Better testability - Each hook and utility can be tested in isolation
Improved maintainability - Changes to common patterns only need to be made once
Type safety - Generic hooks provide proper TypeScript inference
Cleaner component - Your main page.tsx will shrink from ~1000 lines to ~400-500 lines
Consistent error handling - All API calls follow the same pattern
Easier feature additions - New modals, forms, or API calls can reuse existing hooks

Implementation Priority

Start with useModal - Biggest immediate impact
Implement ApiClient - Centralizes all network logic
Add useFormWithSubmit - Simplifies form handling
Extract CanvasUtils - Makes position logic reusable
Add remaining utilities as needed

These refactorings will make your codebase much more maintainable and easier to extend with new features.

   127â†’
   128â†’    const handleMouseMove = (e: MouseEvent) => {
   129â†’      // Always update cursor position
   130â†’      setCursorPosition({ x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY });
   131â†’    };
   132â†’
   133â†’    // Initialize cursor position immediately
   134â†’    const initializeCursorPosition = (e: MouseEvent) => {
   135â†’      setCursorPosition({ x: e.clientX, y: e.clientY });
   136â†’    };
   137â†’
   138â†’    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
   139â†’    window.addEventListener('keyup', handleKeyUp);
   140â†’    window.addEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
   141â†’    // Get initial cursor position
   142â†’    window.addEventListener('mousemove', initializeCursorPosition, { once: true });
   143â†’
   144â†’    return () => {
   145â†’      window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
   146â†’      window.removeEventListener('keyup', handleKeyUp);
   147â†’      window.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleMouseMove);
   148â†’    };
   149â†’  }, [isShiftPressed, fullscreenScrap, showNewScrapModal, showEditScrapModal, isMoveMode]);
   150â†’
   151â†’  // Handle keyboard shortcuts for modals
   152â†’  useEffect(() => {
   153â†’    const handleModalKeyboard = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
   154â†’      // Handle Escape key to close modals
   155â†’      if (e.key === 'Escape') {
   156â†’        if (fullscreenScrap) {
   157â†’          setFullscreenScrap(null);
   158â†’          window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   159â†’        } else if (showNewScrapModal) {
   160â†’          setShowNewScrapModal(false);
   161â†’          setNewScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0 });
   162â†’          setNewScrapError('');
   163â†’          window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   164â†’        } else if (showEditScrapModal) {
   165â†’          setShowEditScrapModal(false);
   166â†’          setEditingScrap(null);
   167â†’          setEditScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0, visible: true });
   168â†’        setOriginalEditScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0, visible: true });
   169â†’          setEditScrapError('');
   170â†’          window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   171â†’        }
   172â†’      }
   173â†’      
   174â†’      // Handle Command+Enter to submit forms
   175â†’      if ((e.metaKey || e.ctrlKey) && e.key === 'Enter') {
   176â†’        e.preventDefault();
   177â†’        if (showNewScrapModal) {
   178â†’          // Trigger new scrap form submission
   179â†’          const formEvent = new Event('submit', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true });
   180â†’          const form = document.querySelector('form');
   181â†’          if (form) {
   182â†’            form.dispatchEvent(formEvent);
   183â†’          }
   184â†’        } else if (showEditScrapModal) {
   185â†’          // Trigger edit scrap form submission
   186â†’          const formEvent = new Event('submit', { bubbles: true, cancelable: true });
   187â†’          const form = document.querySelector('form');
   188â†’          if (form) {
   189â†’            form.dispatchEvent(formEvent);
   190â†’          }
   191â†’        }
   192â†’        // No action for fullscreen modal (view-only)
   193â†’      }
   194â†’    };
   195â†’
   196â†’    // Only add listener if a modal is open
   197â†’    if (fullscreenScrap || showNewScrapModal || showEditScrapModal) {
   198â†’      window.addEventListener('keydown', handleModalKeyboard);
   199â†’    }
   200â†’
   201â†’    return () => {
   202â†’      window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleModalKeyboard);
   203â†’    };
   204â†’  }, [fullscreenScrap, showNewScrapModal, showEditScrapModal]);
   205â†’
   206â†’  useEffect(() => {
   207â†’    if (scraps.length > 0 && !loading) {
   208â†’      calculateCanvasSize();
   209â†’      // Handle hash navigation after scraps are loaded
   210â†’      handleHashNavigation();
   211â†’    } else if (scraps.length === 0 && !loading) {
   212â†’      // No scraps - set minimal canvas size
   213â†’      setCanvasSize({ width: Math.max(window.innerWidth, 1000), height: Math.max(window.innerHeight, 800) });
   214â†’    }
   215â†’    // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps
   216â†’  }, [scraps, loading, handleHashNavigation]);
   217â†’
   218â†’  const calculateCanvasSize = () => {
   219â†’    if (scraps.length === 0) return;
   220â†’
   221â†’    // Calculate bounds of all scraps including their size
   222â†’    const scrapWidth = 300; // max-w-sm is roughly 300px
   223â†’    const scrapHeight = 200; // estimated height
   224â†’    const padding = 100; // padding around edges
   225â†’
   226â†’    const bounds = scraps.reduce(
   227â†’      (acc, scrap) => ({
   228â†’        minX: Math.min(acc.minX, scrap.x),
   229â†’        maxX: Math.max(acc.maxX, scrap.x + scrapWidth),
   230â†’        minY: Math.min(acc.minY, scrap.y),
   231â†’        maxY: Math.max(acc.maxY, scrap.y + scrapHeight),
   232â†’      }),
   233â†’      { minX: Infinity, maxX: -Infinity, minY: Infinity, maxY: -Infinity }
   234â†’    );
   235â†’
   236â†’    // Include origin (0,0) in bounds
   237â†’    bounds.minX = Math.min(bounds.minX, 0);
   238â†’    bounds.minY = Math.min(bounds.minY, 0);
   239â†’    bounds.maxX = Math.max(bounds.maxX, 0);
   240â†’    bounds.maxY = Math.max(bounds.maxY, 0);
   241â†’
   242â†’    // Set canvas size to exactly fit content with padding
   243â†’    const canvasWidth = bounds.maxX - bounds.minX + (2 * padding);
   244â†’    const canvasHeight = bounds.maxY - bounds.minY + (2 * padding);
   245â†’    
   246â†’    setCanvasSize({ width: canvasWidth, height: canvasHeight });
   247â†’  };
   248â†’
   249â†’  // Keep centering function for potential future use
   250â†’  const _centerViewport = () => {
   251â†’    if (scraps.length === 0) return;
   252â†’
   253â†’    const bounds = scraps.reduce(
   254â†’      (acc, scrap) => ({
   255â†’        minX: Math.min(acc.minX, scrap.x),
   256â†’        maxX: Math.max(acc.maxX, scrap.x + 300),
   257â†’        minY: Math.min(acc.minY, scrap.y),
   258â†’        maxY: Math.max(acc.maxY, scrap.y + 200),
   259â†’      }),
   260â†’      { minX: Infinity, maxX: -Infinity, minY: Infinity, maxY: -Infinity }
   261â†’    );
   262â†’
   263â†’    bounds.minX = Math.min(bounds.minX, 0);
   264â†’    bounds.minY = Math.min(bounds.minY, 0);
   265â†’    bounds.maxX = Math.max(bounds.maxX, 0);
   266â†’    bounds.maxY = Math.max(bounds.maxY, 0);
   267â†’
   268â†’    const centerX = (bounds.minX + bounds.maxX) / 2;
   269â†’    const centerY = (bounds.minY + bounds.maxY) / 2;
   270â†’    const padding = 100;
   271â†’
   272â†’    const scrollX = centerX - Math.min(bounds.minX, 0) - window.innerWidth / 2 + padding;
   273â†’    const scrollY = centerY - Math.min(bounds.minY, 0) - window.innerHeight / 2 + padding;
   274â†’
   275â†’    window.scrollTo({
   276â†’      left: Math.max(0, scrollX),
   277â†’      top: Math.max(0, scrollY),
   278â†’      behavior: 'smooth'
   279â†’    });
   280â†’  };
   281â†’  
   282â†’  const checkAdminAccess = async () => {
   283â†’    if (!session?.user?.id) {
   284â†’      setHasAdminAccess(false);
   285â†’      return;
   286â†’    }
   287â†’
   288â†’    try {
   289â†’      const response = await fetch('/api/permissions/check', {
   290â†’        method: 'POST',
   291â†’        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
   292â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
   293â†’          userId: session.user.id,
   294â†’          resource: 'admin',
   295â†’          action: 'access'
   296â†’        }),
   297â†’      });
   298â†’
   299â†’      if (response.ok) {
   300â†’        const { hasPermission } = await response.json();
   301â†’        setHasAdminAccess(hasPermission);
   302â†’      } else {
   303â†’        setHasAdminAccess(false);
   304â†’      }
   305â†’    } catch (err) {
   306â†’      console.error('Error checking admin permissions:', err);
   307â†’      setHasAdminAccess(false);
   308â†’    }
   309â†’  };
   310â†’
   311â†’  const fetchScraps = async () => {
   312â†’    try {
   313â†’      if (session?.user?.id) {
   314â†’        // If authenticated, get all scraps (visible + user's own invisible)
   315â†’        const response = await fetch('/api/scraps');
   316â†’        if (response.ok) {
   317â†’          const data = await response.json();
   318â†’          // Filter: visible scraps + user's own invisible scraps
   319â†’          const filteredScraps = data.scraps.filter((scrap: Scrap) => 
   320â†’            scrap.visible || scrap.userId === session.user.id
   321â†’          );
   322â†’          setScraps(filteredScraps);
   323â†’        } else {
   324â†’          setScraps([]);
   325â†’        }
   326â†’      } else {
   327â†’        // If not authenticated, only get public visible scraps
   328â†’        const response = await fetch('/api/scraps/public');
   329â†’        if (response.ok) {
   330â†’          const data = await response.json();
   331â†’          setScraps(data.scraps);
   332â†’        } else {
   333â†’          setScraps([]);
   334â†’        }
   335â†’      }
   336â†’    } catch (err) {
   337â†’      console.error('Error fetching scraps:', err);
   338â†’      setError('An error occurred while fetching scraps');
   339â†’    } finally {
   340â†’      setLoading(false);
   341â†’    }
   342â†’  };
   343â†’
   344â†’  const _scrapToText = (scrap: Scrap) => {
   345â†’    const scrapData = {
   346â†’      id: scrap.id,
   347â†’      code: scrap.code,
   348â†’      content: scrap.content,
   349â†’      position: { x: scrap.x, y: scrap.y },
   350â†’      author: scrap.userName || scrap.userEmail,
   351â†’      created: new Date(scrap.createdAt).toISOString(),
   352â†’      updated: new Date(scrap.updatedAt).toISOString()
   353â†’    };
   354â†’    
   355â†’    return JSON.stringify(scrapData, null, 2);
   356â†’  };
   357â†’
   358â†’  const [newScrapForm, setNewScrapForm] = useState({
   359â†’    content: '',
   360â†’    x: 0,
   361â†’    y: 0,
   362â†’  });
   363â†’  const [newScrapLoading, setNewScrapLoading] = useState(false);
   364â†’  const [newScrapError, setNewScrapError] = useState('');
   365â†’
   366â†’  const handleNewScrapSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
   367â†’    e.preventDefault();
   368â†’    setNewScrapLoading(true);
   369â†’    setNewScrapError('');
   370â†’
   371â†’    try {
   372â†’      const response = await fetch('/api/scraps', {
   373â†’        method: 'POST',
   374â†’        headers: {
   375â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   376â†’        },
   377â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
   378â†’          content: newScrapForm.content,
   379â†’          x: newScrapForm.x,
   380â†’          y: newScrapForm.y,
   381â†’        }),
   382â†’      });
   383â†’
   384â†’      if (response.ok) {
   385â†’        setShowNewScrapModal(false);
   386â†’        setNewScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0 });
   387â†’        window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   388â†’        fetchScraps(); // Refresh the scraps
   389â†’      } else {
   390â†’        const data = await response.json();
   391â†’        setNewScrapError(data.error || 'Failed to create scrap');
   392â†’      }
   393â†’    } catch (err) {
   394â†’      setNewScrapError('An error occurred while creating the scrap');
   395â†’    } finally {
   396â†’      setNewScrapLoading(false);
   397â†’    }
   398â†’  };
   399â†’
   400â†’  const handleNewScrapInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement>) => {
   401â†’    const { name, value } = e.target;
   402â†’    setNewScrapForm(prev => ({ 
   403â†’      ...prev, 
   404â†’      [name]: name === 'x' || name === 'y' ? parseInt(value) || 0 : value 
   405â†’    }));
   406â†’  };
   407â†’
   408â†’  const [editScrapForm, setEditScrapForm] = useState({
   409â†’    content: '',
   410â†’    x: 0,
   411â†’    y: 0,
   412â†’    visible: true,
   413â†’  });
   414â†’  const [editScrapLoading, setEditScrapLoading] = useState(false);
   415â†’  const [editScrapError, setEditScrapError] = useState('');
   416â†’  const [originalEditScrapForm, setOriginalEditScrapForm] = useState({
   417â†’    content: '',
   418â†’    x: 0,
   419â†’    y: 0,
   420â†’    visible: true,
   421â†’  });
   422â†’
   423â†’  const handleEditScrapClick = (scrap: Scrap) => {
   424â†’    setEditingScrap(scrap);
   425â†’    const formData = {
   426â†’      content: scrap.content,
   427â†’      x: scrap.x,
   428â†’      y: scrap.y,
   429â†’      visible: scrap.visible,
   430â†’    };
   431â†’    setEditScrapForm(formData);
   432â†’    setOriginalEditScrapForm(formData);
   433â†’    setShowEditScrapModal(true);
   434â†’  };
   435â†’
   436â†’  const handleEditScrapSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
   437â†’    e.preventDefault();
   438â†’    if (!editingScrap) return;
   439â†’    
   440â†’    setEditScrapLoading(true);
   441â†’    setEditScrapError('');
   442â†’
   443â†’    try {
   444â†’      const response = await fetch(`/api/scraps/${editingScrap.id}`, {
   445â†’        method: 'PUT',
   446â†’        headers: {
   447â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   448â†’        },
   449â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
   450â†’          content: editScrapForm.content,
   451â†’          x: editScrapForm.x,
   452â†’          y: editScrapForm.y,
   453â†’          visible: editScrapForm.visible,
   454â†’        }),
   455â†’      });
   456â†’
   457â†’      if (response.ok) {
   458â†’        setShowEditScrapModal(false);
   459â†’        setEditingScrap(null);
   460â†’        setEditScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0, visible: true });
   461â†’        setOriginalEditScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0, visible: true });
   462â†’        window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   463â†’        fetchScraps(); // Refresh the scraps
   464â†’      } else {
   465â†’        const data = await response.json();
   466â†’        setEditScrapError(data.error || 'Failed to update scrap');
   467â†’      }
   468â†’    } catch (err) {
   469â†’      setEditScrapError('An error occurred while updating the scrap');
   470â†’    } finally {
   471â†’      setEditScrapLoading(false);
   472â†’    }
   473â†’  };
   474â†’
   475â†’  const handleEditScrapInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement>) => {
   476â†’    const { name, value } = e.target;
   477â†’    setEditScrapForm(prev => ({ 
   478â†’      ...prev, 
   479â†’      [name]: name === 'x' || name === 'y' ? parseInt(value) || 0 : value 
   480â†’    }));
   481â†’  };
   482â†’
   483â†’  // Quill editor configuration - only basic formatting, no font size
   484â†’  const _quillModules = {
   485â†’    toolbar: [
   486â†’      ['bold', 'italic', 'underline'],
   487â†’      [{ 'align': [] }],
   488â†’      [{ 'color': [] }]
   489â†’    ],
   490â†’  };
   491â†’
   492â†’  const _quillFormats = [
   493â†’    'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'align', 'color'
   494â†’  ];
   495â†’
   496â†’  // Listen for hash changes
   497â†’  useEffect(() => {
   498â†’    const handleHashChange = () => {
   499â†’      handleHashNavigation();
   500â†’    };
   501â†’
   502â†’    window.addEventListener('hashchange', handleHashChange);
   503â†’    return () => window.removeEventListener('hashchange', handleHashChange);
   504â†’  }, [scraps, handleHashNavigation]);
   505â†’
   506â†’  // Calculate position accounting for negative coordinates
   507â†’  const getScrapPosition = (scrap: Scrap) => {
   508â†’    if (scraps.length === 0) return { x: scrap.x, y: scrap.y };
   509â†’    
   510â†’    // Calculate the minimum bounds to offset negative coordinates
   511â†’    const minX = Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.x));
   512â†’    const minY = Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.y));
   513â†’    
   514â†’    const padding = 100;
   515â†’    
   516â†’    return { 
   517â†’      x: scrap.x - minX + padding, 
   518â†’      y: scrap.y - minY + padding 
   519â†’    };
   520â†’  };
   521â†’
   522â†’  if (loading) {
   523â†’    return (
   524â†’      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
   525â†’        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading scraps index...</div>
   526â†’      </div>
   527â†’    );
   528â†’  }
   529â†’
   530â†’  const handleCanvasClick = (e: React.MouseEvent) => {
   531â†’    if (isMoveMode && movingScrap) {
   532â†’      // Move the scrap to the clicked position
   533â†’      const clickX = e.pageX;
   534â†’      const clickY = e.pageY;
   535â†’      
   536â†’      // Convert to canvas coordinates (accounting for padding and negative offset)
   537â†’      const minX = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.x)) : 0;
   538â†’      const minY = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.y)) : 0;
   539â†’      const padding = 100;
   540â†’      
   541â†’      const canvasX = clickX + minX - padding;
   542â†’      const canvasY = clickY + minY - padding;
   543â†’      
   544â†’      // Update the scrap position
   545â†’      updateScrapPosition(movingScrap.id, Math.max(0, Math.round(canvasX)), Math.max(0, Math.round(canvasY)));
   546â†’      setIsMoveMode(false);
   547â†’      setMovingScrap(null);
   548â†’      // Reset shift key state to ensure hotkey works after move
   549â†’      setIsShiftPressed(false);
   550â†’    } else if (isShiftPressed && session && !isHoveringScrap && !isMoveMode) {
   551â†’      // Calculate click position relative to the canvas
   552â†’      const clickX = e.pageX;
   553â†’      const clickY = e.pageY;
   554â†’      
   555â†’      // Convert to canvas coordinates (accounting for padding and negative offset)
   556â†’      const minX = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.x)) : 0;
   557â†’      const minY = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.y)) : 0;
   558â†’      const padding = 100;
   559â†’      
   560â†’      const canvasX = clickX + minX - padding;
   561â†’      const canvasY = clickY + minY - padding;
   562â†’      
   563â†’      setNewScrapForm({ 
   564â†’        content: '', 
   565â†’        x: Math.max(0, Math.round(canvasX)), 
   566â†’        y: Math.max(0, Math.round(canvasY))
   567â†’      });
   568â†’      setShowNewScrapModal(true);
   569â†’      setIsShiftPressed(false); // Reset shift state when modal opens
   570â†’    }
   571â†’  };
   572â†’
   573â†’  const updateScrapPosition = async (scrapId: string, x: number, y: number) => {
   574â†’    if (!movingScrap) return;
   575â†’    
   576â†’    try {
   577â†’      const response = await fetch(`/api/scraps/${scrapId}`, {
   578â†’        method: 'PUT',
   579â†’        headers: {
   580â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   581â†’        },
   582â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
   583â†’          content: movingScrap.content,
   584â†’          x: x,
   585â†’          y: y,
   586â†’        }),
   587â†’      });
   588â†’
   589â†’      if (response.ok) {
   590â†’        fetchScraps(); // Refresh the scraps
   591â†’      } else {
   592â†’        console.error('Failed to update scrap position');
   593â†’      }
   594â†’    } catch (err) {
   595â†’      console.error('Error updating scrap position:', err);
   596â†’    }
   597â†’  };
   598â†’
   599â†’  const updateScrapVisibility = async (scrapId: string, visible: boolean) => {
   600â†’    try {
   601â†’      const response = await fetch(`/api/scraps/${scrapId}/visibility`, {
   602â†’        method: 'PUT',
   603â†’        headers: {
   604â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   605â†’        },
   606â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
   607â†’          visible: visible,
   608â†’        }),
   609â†’      });
   610â†’
   611â†’      if (response.ok) {
   612â†’        fetchScraps(); // Refresh the scraps
   613â†’      } else {
   614â†’        console.error('Failed to update scrap visibility');
   615â†’      }
   616â†’    } catch (err) {
   617â†’      console.error('Error updating scrap visibility:', err);
   618â†’    }
   619â†’  };
   620â†’
   621â†’  const hasFormChanged = () => {
   622â†’    return (
   623â†’      editScrapForm.content !== originalEditScrapForm.content ||
   624â†’      editScrapForm.x !== originalEditScrapForm.x ||
   625â†’      editScrapForm.y !== originalEditScrapForm.y
   626â†’    );
   627â†’  };
   628â†’
   629â†’  const handleVisibilityToggle = async () => {
   630â†’    if (!editingScrap) return;
   631â†’    
   632â†’    const newVisibility = !editingScrap.visible;
   633â†’    
   634â†’    // Update visibility immediately
   635â†’    await updateScrapVisibility(editingScrap.id, newVisibility);
   636â†’    
   637â†’    // Update the editingScrap state with the new visibility
   638â†’    setEditingScrap(prev => prev ? { ...prev, visible: newVisibility } : null);
   639â†’    
   640â†’    // Update form state
   641â†’    setEditScrapForm(prev => ({ ...prev, visible: newVisibility }));
   642â†’    setOriginalEditScrapForm(prev => ({ ...prev, visible: newVisibility }));
   643â†’    
   644â†’    // If no other changes, close the modal
   645â†’    if (!hasFormChanged()) {
   646â†’      setShowEditScrapModal(false);
   647â†’      setEditingScrap(null);
   648â†’      setEditScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0, visible: true });
   649â†’      setOriginalEditScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0, visible: true });
   650â†’      setEditScrapError('');
   651â†’      window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   652â†’    }
   653â†’  };
   654â†’
   655â†’  return (
   656â†’    <>
   657â†’      {/* Shift key cursor replacement */}
   658â†’      {isShiftPressed && session && !isMoveMode && (
   659â†’        <div
   660â†’          className={`fixed pointer-events-none inline-flex items-center justify-center w-8 h-8 rounded-full shadow-lg ${
   661â†’            isHoveringScrap 
   662â†’              ? 'bg-gray-400 text-gray-600' 
   663â†’              : `${config.theme.primary.bg} text-white`
   664â†’          }`}
   665â†’          style={{
   666â†’            left: `${cursorPosition.x - 16}px`,
   667â†’            top: `${cursorPosition.y - 16}px`,
   668â†’            zIndex: 1002
   669â†’          }}
   670â†’        >
   671â†’          <PlusIcon className="h-4 w-4" />
   672â†’        </div>
   673â†’      )}
   674â†’
   675â†’      {/* Move mode cursor replacement */}
   676â†’      {isMoveMode && session && (
   677â†’        <div
   678â†’          className={`fixed pointer-events-none inline-flex items-center justify-center w-8 h-8 rounded-full shadow-lg ${config.theme.primary.bg} text-white`}
   679â†’          style={{
   680â†’            left: `${cursorPosition.x - 16}px`,
   681â†’            top: `${cursorPosition.y - 16}px`,
   682â†’            zIndex: 1002
   683â†’          }}
   684â†’        >
   685â†’          <PlusIcon className="h-4 w-4" />
   686â†’        </div>
   687â†’      )}
   688â†’
   689â†’      {/* Infinite canvas - no size restrictions */}
   690â†’      <div 
   691â†’        className="bg-transparent" 
   692â†’        style={{ 
   693â†’          width: `${canvasSize.width}px`, 
   694â†’          height: `${canvasSize.height}px`,
   695â†’          position: 'relative',
   696â†’          cursor: (isShiftPressed && session && !isMoveMode) || isMoveMode ? 'none' : 'default'
   697â†’        }}
   698â†’        onClick={handleCanvasClick}
   699â†’      >
   700â†’        {/* Centered button - + for authenticated users, âš˜ for non-authenticated */}
   701â†’        {session && !isShiftPressed && !isMoveMode && (
   702â†’          <button
   703â†’            onClick={() => {
   704â†’              // Calculate button's center position relative to the canvas
   705â†’              const buttonCenterX = window.scrollX + window.innerWidth / 2;
   706â†’              const buttonCenterY = window.scrollY + window.innerHeight / 2;
   707â†’              
   708â†’              // Convert to canvas coordinates (accounting for padding and negative offset)
   709â†’              const minX = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.x)) : 0;
   710â†’              const minY = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.y)) : 0;
   711â†’              const padding = 100;
   712â†’              
   713â†’              const canvasX = buttonCenterX + minX - padding;
   714â†’              const canvasY = buttonCenterY + minY - padding;
   715â†’              
   716â†’              setNewScrapForm({ 
   717â†’                content: '', 
   718â†’                x: Math.max(0, Math.round(canvasX)), 
   719â†’                y: Math.max(0, Math.round(canvasY))
   720â†’              });
   721â†’              setShowNewScrapModal(true);
   722â†’            }}
   723â†’            className={`fixed top-1/2 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 inline-flex items-center justify-center w-16 h-16 rounded-full ${config.theme.primary.bg} ${config.theme.primary.hover} text-white shadow-lg transition-all hover:scale-110 cursor-pointer`}
   724â†’            title="Create new scrap (or hold Shift and click anywhere)"
   725â†’            style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}
   726â†’          >
   727â†’            <PlusIcon className="h-8 w-8" />
   728â†’          </button>
   729â†’        )}
   730â†’        
   731â†’        {/* Decorative symbol for non-authenticated users */}
   732â†’        {!session && !isShiftPressed && !isMoveMode && (
   733â†’          <div
   734â†’            className="fixed top-1/2 left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 inline-flex items-center justify-center w-16 h-16 rounded-full bg-gray-300 text-gray-600 shadow-lg"
   735â†’            style={{ zIndex: 1000 }}
   736â†’            title="Sign in to create scraps"
   737â†’          >
   738â†’            <span className="text-2xl">âš˜</span>
   739â†’          </div>
   740â†’        )}
   741â†’
   742â†’        {/* Fixed settings and sign out icons bottom right */}
   743â†’        <div className="fixed bottom-6 right-6 flex space-x-2" style={{ zIndex: 999 }}>
   744â†’          {session ? (
   745â†’            <>
   746â†’              <Link
   747â†’                href="/admin"
   748â†’                className="inline-flex items-center justify-center w-12 h-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-full shadow-sm text-gray-700 bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
   749â†’                title="Admin"
   750â†’              >
   751â†’                <CogIcon className="h-6 w-6" />
   752â†’              </Link>
   753â†’              <button
   754â†’                onClick={async () => {
   755â†’                  await signOut({ redirect: false });
   756â†’                  window.location.href = '/';
   757â†’                }}
   758â†’                className="inline-flex items-center justify-center w-12 h-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-full shadow-sm text-gray-700 bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors cursor-pointer"
   759â†’                title="Sign Out"
   760â†’              >
   761â†’                <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon className="h-6 w-6" />
   762â†’              </button>
   763â†’            </>
   764â†’          ) : (
   765â†’            <Link
   766â†’              href="/auth/signin"
   767â†’              className="inline-flex items-center justify-center w-12 h-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-full shadow-sm text-gray-700 bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"
   768â†’              title="Sign In"
   769â†’            >
   770â†’              <UserIcon className="h-6 w-6" />
   771â†’            </Link>
   772â†’          )}
   773â†’        </div>
   774â†’
   775â†’        {/* Error message */}
   776â†’        {_error && (
   777â†’          <div className="fixed top-4 left-4 right-4 p-4 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-md" style={{ zIndex: 998 }}>
   778â†’            <p className="text-red-800">{_error}</p>
   779â†’          </div>
   780â†’        )}
   781â†’
   782â†’        {/* Loading state */}
   783â†’        {loading && (
   784â†’          <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-transparent flex items-center justify-center" style={{ zIndex: 997 }}>
   785â†’            <div className="text-center">
   786â†’              <div className="text-gray-500 text-lg mb-4">Loading corkboard...</div>
   787â†’            </div>
   788â†’          </div>
   789â†’        )}
   790â†’
   791â†’        {/* Empty state */}
   792â†’
   793â†’        {/* Absolutely positioned scraps */}
   794â†’        {!loading && scraps.map((scrap, index) => {
   795â†’          const position = getScrapPosition(scrap);
   796â†’          return (
   797â†’            <div
   798â†’              key={scrap.id}
   799â†’              id={scrap.code}
   800â†’              className={`absolute shadow-lg rounded-lg p-4 max-w-sm transition-shadow cursor-pointer ${
   801â†’                movingScrap?.id === scrap.id 
   802â†’                  ? `${config.theme.moving.bg} ${config.theme.moving.text} border ${config.theme.moving.border}` 
   803â†’                  : !scrap.visible && session?.user?.id === scrap.userId
   804â†’                    ? `${config.theme.invisible.bg} ${config.theme.invisible.text} border border-gray-600 opacity-40 hover:opacity-100 hover:shadow-xl invert`
   805â†’                    : 'bg-white border border-gray-200 hover:shadow-xl'
   806â†’              }`}
   807â†’              style={{
   808â†’                left: `${position.x}px`,
   809â†’                top: `${position.y}px`,
   810â†’                zIndex: scrap.visible ? 10 + index : index
   811â†’              }}
   812â†’              onMouseEnter={() => setIsHoveringScrap(true)}
   813â†’              onMouseLeave={() => setIsHoveringScrap(false)}
   814â†’              onClick={() => {
   815â†’                const newScrap = fullscreenScrap?.id === scrap.id ? null : scrap;
   816â†’                setFullscreenScrap(newScrap);
   817â†’                // Update URL hash
   818â†’                if (newScrap) {
   819â†’                  window.history.pushState(null, '', `#${newScrap.code}`);
   820â†’                } else {
   821â†’                  window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   822â†’                }
   823â†’              }}
   824â†’            >
   825â†’              {/* Header with code and action buttons */}
   826â†’              <div className="flex justify-between items-center mb-3">
   827â†’                <a 
   828â†’                  href={`#${scrap.code}`}
   829â†’                  className={`text-sm font-mono font-bold ${config.theme.primary.text} hover:text-indigo-800`}
   830â†’                  title={`Anchor to ${scrap.code}`}
   831â†’                  onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}
   832â†’                >
   833â†’                  #{scrap.code}
   834â†’                </a>
   835â†’                <div className="flex space-x-1">
   836â†’                  <button
   837â†’                    onClick={(e) => {
   838â†’                      e.stopPropagation();
   839â†’                      if (!scrap.visible && session?.user?.id === scrap.userId) {
   840â†’                        // If it's an invisible scrap, toggle visibility directly
   841â†’                        updateScrapVisibility(scrap.id, true);
   842â†’                      } else {
   843â†’                        // Otherwise open fullscreen modal
   844â†’                        setFullscreenScrap(scrap);
   845â†’                        // Update URL hash
   846â†’                        window.history.pushState(null, '', `#${scrap.code}`);
   847â†’                      }
   848â†’                    }}
   849â†’                    className="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 p-1 rounded hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer"
   850â†’                    title={!scrap.visible && session?.user?.id === scrap.userId ? "Make visible" : "View fullscreen"}
   851â†’                  >
   852â†’                    {!scrap.visible && session?.user?.id === scrap.userId ? (
   853â†’                      <EyeSlashIcon className="h-4 w-4" />
   854â†’                    ) : (
   855â†’                      <ArrowsPointingOutIcon className="h-4 w-4" />
   856â†’                    )}
   857â†’                  </button>
   858â†’                  {session?.user?.id === scrap.userId && (
   859â†’                    <button
   860â†’                      onClick={(e) => {
   861â†’                        e.stopPropagation();
   862â†’                        handleEditScrapClick(scrap);
   863â†’                        // Update URL hash
   864â†’                        window.history.pushState(null, '', `#${scrap.code}`);
   865â†’                      }}
   866â†’                      className="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 p-1 rounded hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer"
   867â†’                      title="Edit this scrap"
   868â†’                    >
   869â†’                      <PencilIcon className="h-4 w-4" />
   870â†’                    </button>
   871â†’                  )}
   872â†’                </div>
   873â†’              </div>
   874â†’
   875â†’              {/* Content */}
   876â†’              <div className="mb-3">
   877â†’                <div 
   878â†’                  className="text-sm text-gray-800 line-clamp-6 froala-content" 
   879â†’                  dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: scrap.content }}
   880â†’                />
   881â†’              </div>
   882â†’
   883â†’              {/* Footer info - simplified */}
   884â†’              <div className="text-xs text-gray-500 border-t pt-2 flex justify-between items-center">
   885â†’                <div>
   886â†’                  {scrap.userName || scrap.userEmail}
   887â†’                </div>
   888â†’                <div>
   889â†’                  {new Date(scrap.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
   890â†’                </div>
   891â†’              </div>
   892â†’            </div>
   893â†’          );
   894â†’        })}
   895â†’      </div>
   896â†’
   897â†’      {/* Fullscreen Modal */}
   898â†’      {fullscreenScrap && (
   899â†’        <div 
   900â†’          className="fixed inset-0 flex items-center justify-center" 
   901â†’          style={{ 
   902â†’            zIndex: 1001,
   903â†’            backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)'
   904â†’          }}
   905â†’          onClick={() => {
   906â†’            setFullscreenScrap(null);
   907â†’            window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   908â†’          }}
   909â†’        >
   910â†’          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] w-full mx-4 flex flex-col overflow-hidden" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}>
   911â†’            <div className="p-6 flex flex-col h-full overflow-hidden">
   912â†’            {/* Header */}
   913â†’            <div className="flex justify-between items-center pb-4 border-b border-gray-200 mb-6">
   914â†’              <a 
   915â†’                href={`#${fullscreenScrap.code}`}
   916â†’                className={`text-lg font-mono font-bold ${config.theme.primary.text} hover:text-indigo-800`}
   917â†’                title={`Anchor to ${fullscreenScrap.code}`}
   918â†’              >
   919â†’                #{fullscreenScrap.code}
   920â†’              </a>
   921â†’              <div className="flex space-x-2">
   922â†’                {session?.user?.id === fullscreenScrap.userId && (
   923â†’                  <>
   924â†’                    <button
   925â†’                      onClick={async () => {
   926â†’                        // Toggle visibility of the scrap directly
   927â†’                        const newVisibility = !fullscreenScrap.visible;
   928â†’                        await updateScrapVisibility(fullscreenScrap.id, newVisibility);
   929â†’                        
   930â†’                        // Close the modal and clear URL hash

   932â†’                        window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   933â†’                      }}
   934â†’                      className="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 p-2 rounded hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer"
   935â†’                      title={fullscreenScrap.visible ? "Make private" : "Make visible"}
   936â†’                    >
   937â†’                      {fullscreenScrap.visible ? <EyeIcon className="h-5 w-5" /> : <EyeSlashIcon className="h-5 w-5" />}
   938â†’                    </button>
   939â†’                    <button
   940â†’                      onClick={() => {
   941â†’                        setMovingScrap(fullscreenScrap);
   942â†’                        setIsMoveMode(true);
   943â†’                        setFullscreenScrap(null);
   944â†’                        // Clear URL hash when entering move mode
   945â†’                        window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   946â†’                      }}
   947â†’                      className="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 p-2 rounded hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer"
   948â†’                      title="Move this scrap"
   949â†’                    >
   950â†’                      <MapPinIcon className="h-5 w-5" />
   951â†’                    </button>
   952â†’                    <button
   953â†’                      onClick={() => {
   954â†’                        handleEditScrapClick(fullscreenScrap);
   955â†’                        setFullscreenScrap(null); // Close fullscreen modal
   956â†’                      }}
   957â†’                      className="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 p-2 rounded hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer"
   958â†’                      title="Edit this scrap"
   959â†’                    >
   960â†’                      <PencilIcon className="h-5 w-5" />
   961â†’                    </button>
   962â†’                  </>
   963â†’                )}
   964â†’                <button
   965â†’                  onClick={() => {
   966â†’                    setFullscreenScrap(null);
   967â†’                    window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
   968â†’                  }}
   969â†’                  className="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 p-2 rounded hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer"
   970â†’                  title="Close fullscreen"
   971â†’                >

   973â†’                </button>
   974â†’              </div>
   975â†’            </div>
   976â†’
   977â†’            {/* Content - scrollable */}
   978â†’            <div className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto mb-6">

   983â†’            </div>
   984â†’
   985â†’            {/* Footer */}
   986â†’            <div className="text-sm text-gray-500 border-t border-gray-200 pt-4 flex justify-between items-center">
   987â†’              <div>
   988â†’                {fullscreenScrap.userName || fullscreenScrap.userEmail}
   989â†’              </div>
   990â†’              <div>

   992â†’              </div>
   993â†’            </div>
   994â†’            </div>
   995â†’          </div>
   996â†’        </div>
   997â†’      )}
   998â†’
   999â†’      {/* New Scrap Modal */}
  1000â†’      {showNewScrapModal && (
  1001â†’        <div 
  1002â†’          className="fixed inset-0 flex items-center justify-center" 
  1003â†’          style={{ 
  1004â†’            zIndex: 1001,
  1005â†’            backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)'
  1006â†’          }}
  1007â†’          onClick={() => {
  1008â†’            setShowNewScrapModal(false);
  1009â†’            setNewScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0 });
  1010â†’            setNewScrapError('');
  1011â†’            window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
  1012â†’          }}
  1013â†’        >
  1014â†’          <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] w-full mx-4 p-6 overflow-y-auto" onClick={(e) => e.stopPropagation()}>
  1015â†’              {/* Header */}
  1016â†’              <div className="flex justify-between items-center pb-4 border-b border-gray-200 mb-6 flex-shrink-0">
  1017â†’                <h2 className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900">
  1018â†’                  Create New Scrap
  1019â†’                </h2>
  1020â†’                <button
  1021â†’                  onClick={() => {
  1022â†’                    setShowNewScrapModal(false);
  1023â†’                    setNewScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0 });
  1024â†’                    setNewScrapError('');
  1025â†’                    window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
  1026â†’                  }}
  1027â†’                  className="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 p-2 rounded hover:bg-gray-100 cursor-pointer"
  1028â†’                  title="Close"
  1029â†’                >

  1031â†’                </button>
  1032â†’              </div>
  1033â†’
  1034â†’              {/* Content Form */}
  1035â†’              <form onSubmit={handleNewScrapSubmit} className="space-y-6">
  1036â†’                <div className="mb-6">
  1037â†’                  <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">
  1038â†’                    Content
  1039â†’                  </label>
  1040â†’                  <div>
  1041â†’                    <FroalaEditor
  1042â†’                      content={newScrapForm.content}
  1043â†’                      onChange={(content) => setNewScrapForm(prev => ({ ...prev, content }))}
  1044â†’                      height={400}
  1045â†’                      maxHeight={600}
  1046â†’                    />
  1047â†’                  </div>
  1048â†’                </div>
  1049â†’
  1050â†’                <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4">
  1051â†’                  <div>
  1052â†’                    <label htmlFor="new-x" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">
  1053â†’                      X Position
  1054â†’                    </label>
  1055â†’                      <input
  1056â†’                        type="number"
  1057â†’                        name="x"
  1058â†’                        id="new-x"
  1059â†’                        value={newScrapForm.x}
  1060â†’                        onChange={handleNewScrapInputChange}
  1061â†’                        min={0}
  1062â†’                        max={999999}
  1063â†’                        className="block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 text-sm px-3 py-2 border"
  1064â†’                      />
  1065â†’                    </div>
  1066â†’
  1067â†’                    <div>
  1068â†’                      <label htmlFor="new-y" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2">
  1069â†’                        Y Position
  1070â†’                      </label>
  1071â†’                      <input
  1072â†’                        type="number"
  1073â†’                        name="y"
  1074â†’                        id="new-y"
  1075â†’                        value={newScrapForm.y}
  1076â†’                        onChange={handleNewScrapInputChange}
  1077â†’                        min={0}
  1078â†’                        max={999999}
  1079â†’                        className="block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 text-sm px-3 py-2 border"
  1080â†’                      />
  1081â†’                    </div>
  1082â†’                  </div>
  1083â†’
  1084â†’                  {newScrapError && (
  1085â†’                    <div className="p-3 bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-md flex-shrink-0">
  1086â†’                      <div className="text-red-800 text-sm">{newScrapError}</div>
  1087â†’                    </div>
  1088â†’                  )}
  1089â†’
  1090â†’                  <div className="flex justify-end space-x-3 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200 flex-shrink-0">
  1091â†’                    <button
  1092â†’                      type="button"
  1093â†’                      onClick={() => {
  1094â†’                        setShowNewScrapModal(false);
  1095â†’                        setNewScrapForm({ content: '', x: 0, y: 0 });
  1096â†’                        setNewScrapError('');
  1097â†’                        window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
  1098â†’                      }}
  1099â†’                      className="px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 cursor-pointer"
  1100â†’                    >

```typescript
import { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react';

interface UseModalOptions {
  onClose?: () => void;
  preventBodyScroll?: boolean;
  updateUrlHash?: string | null;
  escapeToClose?: boolean;
}

export function useModal<T = boolean>(
  initialState: T | null = null,
  options: UseModalOptions = {}
) {
  const {
    onClose,
    preventBodyScroll = true,
    updateUrlHash = null,
    escapeToClose = true
  } = options;

  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(!!initialState);
  const [data, setData] = useState<T | null>(initialState);

  const open = useCallback((newData?: T) => {
    setIsOpen(true);
    if (newData !== undefined) {
      setData(newData);
    }
    if (updateUrlHash) {
      window.history.pushState(null, '', `#${updateUrlHash}`);
    }
  }, [updateUrlHash]);

  const close = useCallback(() => {
    setIsOpen(false);
    setData(null);
    if (updateUrlHash !== null) {
      window.history.pushState(null, '', window.location.pathname);
    }
    onClose?.();
  }, [onClose, updateUrlHash]);

  // Handle body scroll
  useEffect(() => {
    if (preventBodyScroll && isOpen) {
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
      return () => {
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      };
    }
  }, [isOpen, preventBodyScroll]);

  // Handle escape key
  useEffect(() => {
    if (!escapeToClose || !isOpen) return;

    const handleEscape = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape') {
        close();
      }
    };

    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleEscape);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleEscape);
  }, [isOpen, escapeToClose, close]);

  return { isOpen, data, open, close, setData };
}
```

Now let me create the useFormWithSubmit hook:

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```typescript
import { useState, useCallback, FormEvent, ChangeEvent } from 'react';

interface UseFormOptions<T> {
  initialValues: T;
  onSubmit: (values: T) => Promise<void>;
  onSuccess?: () => void;
  onError?: (error: string) => void;
  resetOnSuccess?: boolean;
}

export function useFormWithSubmit<T extends Record<string, any>>({
  initialValues,
  onSubmit,
  onSuccess,
  onError,
  resetOnSuccess = true
}: UseFormOptions<T>) {
  const [values, setValues] = useState<T>(initialValues);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState('');
  const [originalValues, setOriginalValues] = useState<T>(initialValues);

  const handleInputChange = useCallback((
    e: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement | HTMLTextAreaElement>
  ) => {
    const { name, value, type } = e.target;
    setValues(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'number' ? (parseInt(value) || 0) : value
    }));
  }, []);

  const setValue = useCallback((name: keyof T, value: any) => {
    setValues(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value }));
  }, []);

  const handleSubmit = useCallback(async (e?: FormEvent) => {
    e?.preventDefault();
    setLoading(true);
    setError('');

    try {
      await onSubmit(values);
      if (resetOnSuccess) {
        setValues(initialValues);
      }
      onSuccess?.();
    } catch (err) {
      const errorMessage = err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'An error occurred';
      setError(errorMessage);
      onError?.(errorMessage);
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  }, [values, onSubmit, onSuccess, onError, resetOnSuccess, initialValues]);

  const reset = useCallback(() => {
    setValues(initialValues);
    setError('');
    setOriginalValues(initialValues);
  }, [initialValues]);

  const hasChanged = useCallback(() => {
    return Object.keys(values).some(key => values[key] !== originalValues[key]);
  }, [values, originalValues]);

  const setInitialValues = useCallback((newValues: T) => {
    setValues(newValues);
    setOriginalValues(newValues);
  }, []);

  return {
    values,
    loading,
    error,
    handleInputChange,
    handleSubmit,
    setValue,
    setValues,
    reset,
    hasChanged,
    setInitialValues,
    setError
  };
}
```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```typescript
interface Scrap {
  id: string;
  code: string;
  content: string;
  x: number;
  y: number;
  visible: boolean;
  userId: string;
  userName: string;
  userEmail: string;
  createdAt: number;
  updatedAt: number;
}

class ApiClient {
  private async request<T>(
    url: string,
    options?: RequestInit
  ): Promise<T> {
    try {
      const response = await fetch(url, {
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
          ...options?.headers,
        },
        ...options,
      });

      if (!response.ok) {
        const error = await response.json().catch(() => ({ error: 'Request failed' }));
        throw new Error(error.error || `HTTP ${response.status}`);
      }

      return response.json();
    } catch (error) {
      console.error(`API Error: ${url}`, error);
      throw error;
    }
  }

  // Scrap-specific methods
  async fetchScraps(authenticated: boolean) {
    const endpoint = authenticated ? '/api/scraps' : '/api/scraps/public';
    return this.request<{ scraps: Scrap[] }>(endpoint);
  }

  async createScrap(data: { content: string; x: number; y: number }) {
    return this.request('/api/scraps', {
      method: 'POST',
      body: JSON.stringify(data),
    });
  }

  async updateScrap(id: string, data: Partial<Scrap>) {
    return this.request(`/api/scraps/${id}`, {
      method: 'PUT',
      body: JSON.stringify(data),
    });
  }

  async updateScrapVisibility(id: string, visible: boolean) {
    return this.request(`/api/scraps/${id}/visibility`, {
      method: 'PUT',
      body: JSON.stringify({ visible }),
    });
  }

  async checkPermission(userId: string, resource: string, action: string) {
    return this.request<{ hasPermission: boolean }>('/api/permissions/check', {
      method: 'POST',
      body: JSON.stringify({ userId, resource, action }),
    });
  }
}

export const api = new ApiClient();
export type { Scrap };
```

Now let me create the useKeyboardShortcuts hook:

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```typescript
import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react';

interface ShortcutConfig {
  key: string;
  handler: () => void;
  ctrl?: boolean;
  meta?: boolean;
  shift?: boolean;
  alt?: boolean;
  preventDefault?: boolean;
  enabled?: boolean;
}

export function useKeyboardShortcuts(
  shortcuts: ShortcutConfig[],
  deps: any[] = []
) {
  const handlersRef = useRef(shortcuts);
  handlersRef.current = shortcuts;

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleKeyDown = (e: KeyboardEvent) => {
      for (const shortcut of handlersRef.current) {
        if (shortcut.enabled === false) continue;

        const matchesKey = e.key.toLowerCase() === shortcut.key.toLowerCase();
        const matchesCtrl = shortcut.ctrl ? (e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) : true;
        const matchesMeta = shortcut.meta ? e.metaKey : true;
        const matchesShift = shortcut.shift ? e.shiftKey : true;
        const matchesAlt = shortcut.alt ? e.altKey : true;

        if (matchesKey && matchesCtrl && matchesMeta && matchesShift && matchesAlt) {
          if (shortcut.preventDefault !== false) {
            e.preventDefault();
          }
          shortcut.handler();
          break;
        }
      }
    };

    window.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
    return () => window.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
  }, deps);
}
```

```typescript
import type { Scrap } from '../lib/api';

export class CanvasUtils {
  static getCanvasBounds(scraps: Scrap[]) {
    if (scraps.length === 0) {
      return { minX: 0, maxX: 0, minY: 0, maxY: 0 };
    }

    const scrapWidth = 300;
    const scrapHeight = 200;

    const bounds = scraps.reduce(
      (acc, scrap) => ({
        minX: Math.min(acc.minX, scrap.x),
        maxX: Math.max(acc.maxX, scrap.x + scrapWidth),
        minY: Math.min(acc.minY, scrap.y),
        maxY: Math.max(acc.maxY, scrap.y + scrapHeight),
      }),
      { minX: Infinity, maxX: -Infinity, minY: Infinity, maxY: -Infinity }
    );

    // Include origin in bounds
    bounds.minX = Math.min(bounds.minX, 0);
    bounds.minY = Math.min(bounds.minY, 0);
    bounds.maxX = Math.max(bounds.maxX, 0);
    bounds.maxY = Math.max(bounds.maxY, 0);

    return bounds;
  }

  static pageToCanvasCoordinates(
    pageX: number,
    pageY: number,
    scraps: Scrap[],
    padding: number = 100
  ) {
    const minX = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.x)) : 0;
    const minY = scraps.length > 0 ? Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.y)) : 0;
    
    return {
      x: Math.max(0, Math.round(pageX + minX - padding)),
      y: Math.max(0, Math.round(pageY + minY - padding))
    };
  }

  static getScrapDisplayPosition(scrap: Scrap, scraps: Scrap[], padding: number = 100) {
    if (scraps.length === 0) return { x: scrap.x, y: scrap.y };
    
    const minX = Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.x));
    const minY = Math.min(0, ...scraps.map(s => s.y));
    
    return { 
      x: scrap.x - minX + padding, 
      y: scrap.y - minY + padding 
    };
  }

  static calculateCanvasSize(scraps: Scrap[], padding: number = 100) {
    if (scraps.length === 0) {
      return { 
        width: Math.max(window.innerWidth, 1000), 
        height: Math.max(window.innerHeight, 800) 
      };
    }

    const bounds = this.getCanvasBounds(scraps);
    const canvasWidth = bounds.maxX - bounds.minX + (2 * padding);
    const canvasHeight = bounds.maxY - bounds.minY + (2 * padding);
    
    return { width: canvasWidth, height: canvasHeight };
  }
}
```

File created successfully at: /Users/austin/Coding/claudeland/corkboard/src/utils/canvas.ts

Now let me create the useLoadingState hook:

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```typescript
import { useState, useCallback } from 'react';

export function useLoadingState<T extends (...args: any[]) => Promise<any>>(
  asyncFunction: T
) {
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
  const [error, setError] = useState<Error | null>(null);

  const execute = useCallback(async (...args: Parameters<T>) => {
    setLoading(true);
    setError(null);
    
    try {
      const result = await asyncFunction(...args);
      return result;
    } catch (err) {
      const error = err instanceof Error ? err : new Error('Unknown error');
      setError(error);
      throw error;
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  }, [asyncFunction]);

  return { execute, loading, error, setError };
}
```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```typescript
import type { Scrap } from '../lib/api';

export const ScrapPermissions = {
  canEdit(scrap: Scrap, userId?: string): boolean {
    return !!userId && scrap.userId === userId;
  },

  canView(scrap: Scrap, userId?: string): boolean {
    return scrap.visible || this.canEdit(scrap, userId);
  },

  canDelete(scrap: Scrap, userId?: string): boolean {
    return this.canEdit(scrap, userId);
  },

  filterViewableScraps(scraps: Scrap[], userId?: string): Scrap[] {
    return scraps.filter(scrap => this.canView(scrap, userId));
  }
};
```

Tool use: **Write**

```tsx
import { render, screen, fireEvent, waitFor } from '@testing-library/react';
import { SessionProvider } from 'next-auth/react';
import HomePage from '../../src/app/page';

// Mock Next.js dynamic import
jest.mock('next/dynamic', () => {
  return (dynamicComponent: () => Promise<any>) => {
    const Component = () => <div data-testid="froala-editor">Mocked Froala Editor</div>;
    Component.displayName = 'DynamicComponent';
    return Component;
  };
});

// Mock the config
jest.mock('../../../corkboard.config', () => ({
  theme: {
    primary: {
      bg: 'bg-indigo-600',
      hover: 'hover:bg-indigo-700',
      text: 'text-indigo-600'
    },
    moving: {
      bg: 'bg-yellow-100',
      text: 'text-yellow-800',
      border: 'border-yellow-300'
    },
    invisible: {
      bg: 'bg-gray-100',
      text: 'text-gray-500'
    }
  }
}));

// Mock fetch API
global.fetch = jest.fn();

const mockSession = {
  user: {
    id: 'user-1',
    email: 'test@example.com',
    name: 'Test User'
  }
};

const mockScraps = [
  {
    id: 'scrap-1',
    code: 'ABC123',
    content: '<p>Test scrap content</p>',
    x: 100,
    y: 200,
    visible: true,
    userId: 'user-1',
    userName: 'Test User',
    userEmail: 'test@example.com',
    createdAt: Date.now(),
    updatedAt: Date.now()
  }
];

describe('HomePage Modal Interactions', () => {
  beforeEach(() => {
    jest.clearAllMocks();
    
    // Mock successful scraps fetch
    (global.fetch as jest.Mock).mockResolvedValue({
      ok: true,
      json: async () => ({ scraps: mockScraps })
    });
  });

  test('should open fullscreen modal when clicking on scrap', async () => {
    render(
      <SessionProvider session={mockSession}>
        <HomePage />
      </SessionProvider>
    );

    // Wait for scraps to load
    await waitFor(() => {
      expect(screen.getByText('#ABC123')).toBeInTheDocument();
    });

    // Find and click on the scrap
    const scrapElement = screen.getByText('#ABC123').closest('div');
    expect(scrapElement).toBeInTheDocument();
    
    // This should trigger the fullscreen modal without errors
    fireEvent.click(scrapElement!);

    // Should open fullscreen modal
    await waitFor(() => {
      expect(screen.getByText('Edit Scrap #ABC123')).toBeInTheDocument();
    }, { timeout: 2000 });
  });

  test('should handle hash navigation to open fullscreen modal', async () => {
    // Mock window.location.hash
    Object.defineProperty(window, 'location', {
      value: {
        ...window.location,
        hash: '#ABC123',
        pathname: '/'
      },
      writable: true
    });

    render(
      <SessionProvider session={mockSession}>
        <HomePage />
      </SessionProvider>
    );

    // Wait for scraps to load and hash navigation to trigger
    await waitFor(() => {
      expect(screen.getByText('#ABC123')).toBeInTheDocument();
    });

    // Hash navigation should trigger fullscreen modal automatically
    await waitFor(() => {
      expect(screen.getByText('Edit Scrap #ABC123')).toBeInTheDocument();
    }, { timeout: 3000 });
  });

  test('should open fullscreen modal via expand button', async () => {
    render(
      <SessionProvider session={mockSession}>
        <HomePage />
      </SessionProvider>
    );

    // Wait for scraps to load
    await waitFor(() => {
      expect(screen.getByText('#ABC123')).toBeInTheDocument();
    });

    // Find the expand button (ArrowsPointingOutIcon)
    const expandButton = screen.getByTitle('View fullscreen');
    expect(expandButton).toBeInTheDocument();
    
    // Click the expand button - this should not cause setFullscreenScrap error
    fireEvent.click(expandButton);

    // Should open fullscreen modal
    await waitFor(() => {
      expect(screen.getByText('Edit Scrap #ABC123')).toBeInTheDocument();
    }, { timeout: 2000 });
  });
});
```

Result:

File created successfully at: /Users/austin/Coding/claudeland/corkboard/tests/components/page-modal-interactions.test.tsx

1â†’interface Scrap {
     2â†’  id: string;
     3â†’  code: string;
     4â†’  content: string;
     5â†’  x: number;
     6â†’  y: number;
     7â†’  visible: boolean;
     8â†’  userId: string;
     9â†’  userName: string;
    10â†’  userEmail: string;
    11â†’  createdAt: number;
    12â†’  updatedAt: number;
    13â†’}
    14â†’
    15â†’class ApiClient {
    16â†’  private async request<T>(
    17â†’    url: string,
    18â†’    options?: RequestInit
    19â†’  ): Promise<T> {
    20â†’    try {
    21â†’      const response = await fetch(url, {
    22â†’        headers: {
    23â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    24â†’          ...options?.headers,
    25â†’        },
    26â†’        ...options,
    27â†’      });
    28â†’
    29â†’      if (!response.ok) {
    30â†’        const error = await response.json().catch(() => ({ error: 'Request failed' }));
    31â†’        throw new Error(error.error || `HTTP ${response.status}`);
    32â†’      }
    33â†’
    34â†’      return response.json();
    35â†’    } catch (error) {
    36â†’      console.error(`API Error: ${url}`, error);
    37â†’      throw error;
    38â†’    }
    39â†’  }
    40â†’
    41â†’  // Scrap-specific methods
    42â†’  async fetchScraps(authenticated: boolean) {
    43â†’    const endpoint = authenticated ? '/api/scraps' : '/api/scraps/public';
    44â†’    return this.request<{ scraps: Scrap[] }>(endpoint);
    45â†’  }
    46â†’
    47â†’  async createScrap(data: { content: string; x: number; y: number }) {
    48â†’    return this.request('/api/scraps', {
    49â†’      method: 'POST',
    50â†’      body: JSON.stringify(data),
    51â†’    });
    52â†’  }
    53â†’
    54â†’  async updateScrap(id: string, data: Partial<Scrap>) {
    55â†’    return this.request(`/api/scraps/${id}`, {
    56â†’      method: 'PUT',
    57â†’      body: JSON.stringify(data),
    58â†’    });
    59â†’  }
    60â†’
    61â†’  async updateScrapVisibility(id: string, visible: boolean) {
    62â†’    return this.request(`/api/scraps/${id}/visibility`, {
    63â†’      method: 'PUT',
    64â†’      body: JSON.stringify({ visible }),
    65â†’    });
    66â†’  }
    67â†’
    68â†’  async checkPermission(userId: string, resource: string, action: string) {
    69â†’    return this.request<{ hasPermission: boolean }>('/api/permissions/check', {
    70â†’      method: 'POST',
    71â†’      body: JSON.stringify({ userId, resource, action }),
    72â†’    });
    73â†’  }
    74â†’}
    75â†’
    76â†’export const api = new ApiClient();
    77â†’export type { Scrap };
